name: Library Management System
description: A comprehensive library management solution built with C# and .NET Core. Features include book checkout/return tracking, member management, fine calculation, and detailed reporting for library administrators.

name: Point Of Sale System
description: A robust POS system built with Java and Java Swing, designed for retail and restaurant businesses. Features inventory management, sales tracking, employee management, and detailed reporting capabilities.

name: Chat Application
description: A real-time mobile chat application with secure messaging features. Built with React Native and Node.js, it allows for instant communication, media sharing, and supports both individual and group chats.

name: Finance Management System
description: A finance tracking and management application to help businesses and individuals monitor expenses, track income, and generate financial reports. Includes budget planning, transaction categorization, and visualized analytics.

name: Eshop React Laravel API
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with a React frontend and Laravel API backend. Features product listings, shopping cart functionality, secure checkout with PayPal integration, and user account management.

name: Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio website built using React and Tailwind CSS. Features a responsive design with dark/light mode, interactive UI components, and showcases my skills, experience, and project portfolio.

name: KET Family Support Service
description: A web platform for a family support service organization offering counseling and community resources. Features service booking, resource hub, counselor profiles, and community forum sections.

name: Sachitha Plastic
description: A corporate website and inventory management system for Sachitha Plastic manufacturing company. Includes product catalog, order management, manufacturing process tracking, and distributor portal.

name: EverMuzic
description: A music streaming platform with artist profiles, playlist creation, and song discovery features. Users can follow artists, create custom playlists, and enjoy personalized music recommendations based on listening habits.

name: Movie Zone
description: A feature-rich movie browsing application that utilizes third-party APIs to provide users with detailed movie information, reviews, ratings, and streaming availability. Includes watchlist functionality and personalized recommendations.

name: Discounts LK
description: A platform that aggregates and showcases deals and discounts across various stores and services in Sri Lanka. Users can search for deals by category, location, and store, with features for deal alerts and user reviews.
